price: They will have with their Lord whatever they wish for. Such is the reward of those who do good.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
